_header: Hail stern supern hail in eterne
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 516.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Ane ballat of Our Lady’ — seven aureate 12-line stanzas (ababababcbab) with Latin bob: ‘Aue Maria Gratia plena’

Asloan.First Lines:
Hale sterne superne hale In eterneIn godis sicht to
                    schyne…
Asloan.Last Lines:
…ffra fall mortall originallWs raunsomid on þe
                    rude
Asloan.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript by Chalmers in Edinburgh,  Edinburgh University Library La.III.450/1 [olim Laing 450],
                    ff. 54-55v.
